to report earnings, excluding items, of$ 8.06 a share, on$ 6.05 billion in revenue. ''Q4 marked a terrific end to a stellar year,'' Eric Schmidt said in a statement. These results give us the optimism and confidence to invest heavily in future growth-- investments that will benefit our users, Google and the wider web.
